records.Message:
This is an automated message from the Victorian Department of Health and Human Services, please do not reply to this message. This message is being sent to you regarding your interstate travel from South Australia. We strongly recommend testing immediately on entry to Victoria. Please see testing locations in the link below

https://www.dhhs.vic.gov.au/where-get-tested-covid-19

Department of Health and Human Services Victoria | Where to get tested
Victoria's restriction levels. Find out about the current restrictions in place. How to stay safe and well. Find out what you can do to reduce the risk and stop the spread of COVID-19, including resources for mental health and family violence support.
www.dhhs.vic.gov.au
